section.title: File sharing
section.para:
You can get into file sharing server configuration entering into
File sharing
. To activate file sharing, just select from the status list, at the upper configuration page, "Enabled" status and accept the changes clicking at "Change".

If you want to have file sharing fully working, you need to configure these fields:
Work Group
Only users who belong to the same workgroup can share their files between them.
Netbios name
Name that eBox will have inside the network.
Description
Host Description.
Quota limit
Quota disk limit on MB to use for each user. If you don't want to set any quota is OK to fill this field with zero value.
